Name: Cross Blast
Desc: Deploy and detonate a bomb that creates a cross-shaped blast, <color=#CF4029>dealing 15% Max HP in DMG to all squad members</color> while clearing <color=#2BAD00>most event tiles</color> in the blast radius. <color=#2BAD00>Normal and Elite enemies will drop Resonia</color>.
Desc2: Send mini Bangboo to carpet bomb in all directions to eradicate any uncertainty on the road ahead.
